Posts.Content: Hi there I hope that I’m not too late to ask this as I noticed this was two years ago, I wondered if you ever did get a full reason for the rash as I am Now suffering something extremely similar and cannot find anything much about it on the Internet. I have only recently finished my radiation of my breast. The The rash started between my breast and then seem to follow underneath the breast And up into the armpit.  Sorry it probably is a bit late anyway just thought maybe you could tell me what happened. XX
Posts.Title: Lymphangitis

Posts.Content: Ok Thank you I didn’t think there was much chance of a reply but thought it was worth a shot I don’t use E 45 when it first started the doctor gave me a betnovate ,  I think you’re right though I’ll contact the breast care nurse and see if she can ask the oncologist today I was hoping this week was going to be free of appointments but it doesn’t look like it thank you XX
Posts.Title: Lymphangitis

Posts.Content: Hi there welcome understand how you feel completely I was diagnosed in April I hated the whole thing waiting for the results and even though I have only just been for my first radiotherapy session today I still can’t believe I actually have cancer. My advice would be  take somebody with you for the result it’s an extra pair of ears and if not ask them if they mind if you take the conversation on your phone you will forget half of it I promise you. Next take it one step at a time it gets easier as the time goes on and you will just cope with a laugh with cry with it let it be . I never like to say good luck love and trust is what you need and you will get through it.  I truly believe that feeling positive is The best way to get through it. Love and light . Kas. Xx
Posts.Title: Hello!!!
